Name: Frietsteeg
Review Text: Pretty much the best fries in Zuid. The lines are usually very long in the evenings but it's worth it. The fries are crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. Portions are generous and it's a good value meal. Would recommend visiting if in the neighborhood but as a tourists I would go to Vleminx.

Name: Frietsteeg
Review Text: Customer cut in line but I still got my order faster, thanks to the employee with curly hair! Great service, killer fries as always. Perfect sauce-to-fry and also onion-to-sauce ratio. They know what good fries are, definitely recommend. …

Name: Frietsteeg
Review Text: The fries are great, but it's really disappointing that some of the staff can be very rude or even aggressive. I can understand that some days are harder than others for the staff, but it's actually always the same two who are rude / unprofessional.

Name: Frietsteeg

Name: Frietsteeg
Review Text: Very nice Fries and Snacks here. The frikandel and kipcorn taste delicious. There is special and also spicy sauce available with onions. Nice place to sit outside the cafe and is located next to the water canal. So enjoy the street,water view and also the food.

Name: Frietsteeg
Review Text: Not super-friendly for tourists; one of the workers seemed to enjoy ridiculing anyone who couldn't speak fluent Dutch. My husband said his fries were good, so I'm sure locals would be fine here. The fry stand at the end of Albert Cuypstraat Market had much nicer workers, though, so I'd go back there next time.
